definitions.definition: the firing of a gun or cannon.
examples: he brought down a caribou with a single shot to the neck

definitions.definition: an attempt to hit a target by shooting.
examples: he asked me if I would like to have a shot at a pheasant

definitions.definition: the range of a gun or cannon.
examples: six more desperadoes came galloping up and halted just out of rifle shot
Paul tried one last shot—“You realize what you want will cost more money?”

definitions.definition: a person with a specified level of ability in shooting.
examples: he was an excellent shot at short and long distances

definitions.definition: a hit, stroke, or kick of the ball in sports such as basketball, tennis, or golf.
examples: his partner pulled off a winning backhand shot

definitions.definition: an attempt to drive a ball into a goal; an attempt to score.
examples: he took a shot that the goalie stopped
several of the competitors will have a shot at the title
synonyms: crack; formalessay "it's nice to get a shot at driving"

definitions.definition: a ball of stone or metal used as a missile fired from a large gun or cannon.
examples: bullets, cannonballs, pellets, ammunition the cannons have run out of shot

definitions.definition: tiny lead pellets used in quantity in a single charge or cartridge in a shotgun.
examples: noun: lead shot; plural noun: lead shots

definitions.definition: a heavy ball thrown by a shot-putter.

examples: she took a shot of me holding a lamp near my face
synonyms: still "a shot of us on holiday"

definitions.definition: a film sequence photographed continuously by one camera.
examples: the movie's opening shot is of a character walking across a featureless landscape

definitions.definition: the range of a camera's view.
examples: a prop man was standing just out of shot

definitions.definition: a small drink, especially of distilled liquor.
examples: he took a shot of whiskey
steamed milk with a shot of espresso

definitions.definition: an injection of a drug or vaccine.
examples: Jerry gave the monkey a shot of a sedative

definitions.definition: the launch of a space rocket.
